mapper.select: SELECT id, duty_start_time, influence_type, class_duration, month_duration, year_duration, term FROM `tb_report_form_influence_time` WHERE duty_start_time = #{nowDutyStartTime};
SELECT id, duty_start_time, remarks, factory_duty_leader, checker, dispatcher FROM `tb_report_form_influence_time_remarks` WHERE duty_start_time = #{nowDutyStartTime};

SELECT id, duty_start_time, influence_type, class_duration, month_duration, year_duration, term FROM tb_report_form_influence_time WHERE ( SELECT duty_start_time FROM tb_report_form_influence_time WHERE duty_start_time < #{nowDutyStartTime} ORDER BY duty_start_time DESC LIMIT 1 ) = duty_start_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_report_form_influence_time ( duty_start_time, influence_type, class_duration, month_duration, year_duration, term ) VALUES ( #{dutyStartTime}, #{influenceType}, #{classDuration}, #{monthDuration}, #{yearDuration}, #{term})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_report_form_influence_time SET duty_start_time= #{dutyStartTime}, influence_type=#{influenceType}, class_duration=#{classDuration}, month_duration=#{monthDuration}, year_duration=#{yearDuration}, term=#{term} WHERE id =#{id}
